outputs.output_descr:
The early recovery approaches seek to build the resilience of communities against the impact of disasters, and support communities to return to normalcy at the earliest time possible by supporting the resumption of livelihoods, supporting authorities to provide public services, and advocating for other humanitarian interventions.

1. Strengthened ER awareness, understanding and capacity building at the National, District and project levels

2. Improved coordination for the ER Working Group

3. Documented and published best practices as a future guidance and learning tool for NGOs and agencies
